text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a DOCSECT

name: ActClassDocumentSection
title: ActClassDocumentSection
description: A context that subdivides the body of a document. Document sections are typically used for human navigation, to give a reader a clue as to the expected content. Document sections are used to organize and provide consistency to the contents of a document body. Document sections can contain document sections and can contain entries.
